verses.verse: And <S%H1121>you<s%>, son of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H2299>sharp<s%> <S%H2719>knife<s%>, <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H1532>barber<s%>'s <S%H8593>razor<s%>, and cause it to <S%H5674>pass<s%> upon your <S%H7218>head<s%> and upon your <S%H2206>beard<s%>: then <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H3976>balances<s%> to <S%H4948>weigh<s%>, and divide the <S%H2505>hair<s%>.

You shall <S%H1197>burn<s%> with <S%H217>fire<s%> a third <S%H7992>part<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%>, when the <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H4692>siege<s%> are <S%H4390>fulfilled<s%>: and you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> a third <S%H7992>part<s%>, and <S%H5221>strike<s%> <S%H5439>about<s%> it with a <S%H2719>knife<s%>: and a third <S%H7992>part<s%> you shall <S%H2219>scatter<s%> in the <S%H7307>wind<s%>; and I will draw <S%H7324>out<s%> a <S%H2719>sword<s%> after <S%H310>them<s%>.
You shall also <S%H3947>take<s%> there a <S%H4592>few<s%> in <S%H4557>number<s%>, and <S%H6696>bind<s%> them in your <S%H3671>skirts<s%>.

Then take of them <S%H3947>again<s%>, and <S%H7993>cast<s%> them into the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H784>fire<s%>, and <S%H8313>burn<s%> them in the <S%H784>fire<s%>; for there shall a <S%H784>fire<s%> come <S%H3318>forth<s%> into all the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>; This is <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>: I have <S%H7760>set<s%> it in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%> and <S%H776>countries<s%> that are round about <S%H5439>her<s%>.

And she has <S%H4784>changed<s%> my <S%H4941>judgments<s%> into <S%H7564>wickedness<s%> more than the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, and my <S%H2708>statutes<s%> more than the <S%H776>countries<s%> that are round <S%H5439>about<s%> <S%H3988>her<s%>: for they have refused my <S%H4941>judgments<s%> and my <S%H2708>statutes<s%>, they have not walked in <S%H1980>them<s%>.

Therefore thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>; Because you <S%H1995>multiplied<s%> more than the <S%H1471>nations<s%> that are round <S%H5439>about<s%> <S%H1980>you<s%>, and have not walked in my <S%H2708>statutes<s%>, neither have <S%H6213>kept<s%> my <S%H4941>judgments<s%>, neither have <S%H6213>done<s%> according to the <S%H4941>judgments<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%> that are round about <S%H5439>you<s%>;

Therefore thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>; <S%H6213>Behold<s%>, I, even I, am against you, and will execute <S%H4941>judgments<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of you in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%>.
And I will <S%H6213>do<s%> in you that which I have not <S%H6213>done<s%>, and unto what I will not <S%H6213>do<s%> any more the <S%H3282>like<s%>, because of all your <S%H8441>abominations<s%>.

Therefore the <S%H1>fathers<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H1121>you<s%>, and the sons shall <S%H398>eat<s%> their <S%H1>fathers<s%>; and I will <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H8201>judgments<s%> in <S%H7611>you<s%>, and the whole remnant of you will I <S%H2219>scatter<s%> into all the <S%H7307>winds<s%>.

<S%H2416>Therefore<s%>, as I live, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>; <S%H2930>Surely<s%>, because you have defiled my <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> with all your detestable <S%H8251>things<s%>, and with all your <S%H8441>abominations<s%>, therefore will I also <S%H1639>diminish<s%> <S%H5869>you<s%>; neither shall my eye <S%H2347>spare<s%>, neither will I have any <S%H2550>pity<s%>.

A third <S%H7992>part<s%> of you shall <S%H4191>die<s%> with the <S%H1698>pestilence<s%>, and with <S%H7458>famine<s%> shall they be <S%H3615>consumed<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H7992>you<s%>: and a third part shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> <S%H2219>you<s%>; and I will scatter a third <S%H7992>part<s%> into all the <S%H7307>winds<s%>, and I will draw <S%H7324>out<s%> a <S%H2719>sword<s%> after <S%H310>them<s%>.

Thus shall my <S%H639>anger<s%> be <S%H3615>accomplished<s%>, and I will cause my <S%H2534>fury<s%> to <S%H5117>rest<s%> upon <S%H5162>them<s%>, and I will be comforted: and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> it in my <S%H7068>zeal<s%>, when I have <S%H3615>accomplished<s%> my fury in <S%H2534>them<s%>.

Moreover I will <S%H5414>make<s%> you <S%H2723>waste<s%>, and a <S%H2781>reproach<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations<s%> that are round <S%H5439>about<s%> <S%H5869>you<s%>, in the sight of all that pass <S%H5674>by<s%>.

So it shall be a <S%H2781>reproach<s%> and a <S%H1422>taunt<s%>, a <S%H4148>instruction<s%> and a <S%H4923>astonishment<s%> unto the <S%H1471>nations<s%> that are round <S%H5439>about<s%> <S%H6213>you<s%>, when I shall execute <S%H8201>judgments<s%> in you in <S%H639>anger<s%> and in <S%H2534>fury<s%> and in <S%H2534>furious<s%> <S%H8433>rebukes<s%>. I the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> have spoken <S%H1696>it<s%>.

When I shall <S%H7971>send<s%> upon them the <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H2671>arrows<s%> of <S%H7458>famine<s%>, which shall be for their <S%H4889>destruction<s%>, and which I will <S%H7971>send<s%> to <S%H7843>destroy<s%> <S%H3254>you<s%>: and I will increase the <S%H7458>famine<s%> upon <S%H7665>you<s%>, and will break your <S%H4294>staff<s%> of <S%H3899>bread<s%>:

So will I <S%H7971>send<s%> upon you <S%H7458>famine<s%> and <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H2416>animals<s%>, and they shall <S%H7921>bereave<s%> <S%H1698>you<s%>; and pestilence and <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall pass <S%H5674>through<s%> <S%H935>you<s%>; and I will bring the <S%H2719>sword<s%> upon <S%H3068>you<s%>. I the Lord have spoken <S%H1696>it<s%>.
